snippet: Detroit’s mayor and City Council are entering budget deliberations under a new reality: Kevyn Orr, the emergency financial manager, has the final word.
abstract: Detroit's Mayor Dave Bing and its City Council will participate in budget negotiations but final say will go to Kevyn Orr, emergency financial manager appointed by Gov Rick Snyder to address city's significant cash shortfalls; move makes Detroit one of the largest American cities to receive such state intervention.
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s mayor and City Council are entering budget deliberations under a new reality: Kevyn Orr, the emergency financial manager, has the final word.

headline.seo: Detroit’s Leaders Adjust to Life Under a Manager
headline.main: Detroit’s Leaders Carry on, but Know Who’s Really in Charge
headline.print_headline: Detroit’s Leaders Carry On, but Know Who’s Really in Charge
